import React from 'react'; // get data import axios from 'axios'; import SimpleImageSlider from "react-simple-image-slider"; import { BottomSheet } from 'react-spring-bottom-sheet'; import { RWebShare } from "react-web-share"; import windowDimensions from '../Global/useWindowDimensions'; import 'react-spring-bottom-sheet/dist/style.css'; import ReadMoreReact from 'read-more-react'; const AllPostScreen = () => { const sheetRef = React.useRef(); const [open, setOpen] = React.useState(false); const [PostData, setPostData] = React.useState([]); const { height, width } = windowDimensions(); const [images] = React.useState([ { id: 1, url: "./assets/images/ahmed1.jpg", name: "Macline" }, { id: 2, url: "./assets/images/ahsan1.jpg", name: "ahsan32" }, { id: 3, url: "./assets/images/babar1.jpg", name: "babar42" }, { id: 4, url: "./assets/images/fawad1.jpg", name: "fawad2" }, { id: 5, url: "./assets/images/feroz1.jpg", name: "feroz432" }, { id: 6, url: "./assets/images/0.jfif", name: "adil5" }, { id: 7, url: "./assets/images/imrankhan1.jpg", name: "imran4" }, { id: 8, url: "./assets/images/imrankhan3.jpg", name: "khan4" }, { id: 9, url: "./assets/images/imrankhanpost.jpg", name: "alikhan4" }, ]); //creating function to load ip address from the API const getData = async () => { await axios.get('https://amazingtech.space/PTI/api/posts-list') .then((res) => { if (res.data.status === true) { setPostData(res.data.post); console.log('getPostData', JSON.stringify(res.data)) } } ).catch((err) => console.log('', JSON.stringify(err))); } React.useEffect(() => { //passing getData method to the lifecycle method if (localStorage.getItem("user_ip")) { getData(); } }, []) return ( <>
